name: Tanabata
description:
Escape from the cacophony of the festival by writing wishes to hang on a bamboo tree! You can read the wishes of others and view the festival as well.

Controls:

WASD - Pan Camera

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Interact with other wishes on the Tanabata tree!~

Programmers:
